sections.title: Infrastructure Migration
sections.description: Companies planning to migrate their infrastructure to cloud can leverage InfraCloud’s Terraform consulting and engineering services for a smooth transition & cloud-native technology adoption. Our Terraform consultants have experience in migrating to all major cloud providers such as AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.
offerings: Our Terraform and cloud experts help you find the right cloud provider for your business goals.
Set up your cloud accounts with security best practices.
Migrate your existing Infrastructure to cloud with help from our team of HashiCorp Terraform experts.

sections.description: Our Terraform consulting experts can help you to:
offerings: Provision new infrastructure with Terraform Infrastructure as Code, using HCL (HashiCorp Configuration Language) - its high-level configuration language.
Import existing infrastructure into your source code repository.
Our HashiCorp Terraform experts manage updates to the infrastructure by updating the HCL code.
Terraform consultants automate your varying infrastructure needs with Terraform for optimal performance & cost.

sections.title: Managing Kubernetes Workloads Across Multiple Cloud Providers
sections.description: Terraform & Kubernetes are analogues to each other. Like Terraform is an Infrastructure Orchestration solution, Kubernetes is a Container Orchestration solution. Spend more time building applications and less time building environments by integrating Terraform with Kubernetes.
offerings: Our Terraform & Kubernetes experts can help you implement techniques & principles in cloud-native environment.
Deploy & manage Kubernetes clusters using Terraform on various cloud providers such as AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.

sections.title: Choose & Adopt Terraform Cloud or Terraform Enterprise
sections.description: Use InfraCloud’s Terraform consulting services to identify the right fit for your business and to deploy & manage your infrastructure on the same. Based on the customer needs, we will adopt their Infrastructure automation to Terraform Cloud or Enterprise.
offerings: Terraform Cloud is a hosted service that lets teams use Terraform Together. It provides easy access to shared state and secret data. It also governs Terraform configurations with policy controls.
Terraform Enterprise is nothing but a self-hosted Terraform Cloud. It lets you install & run Terraform Cloud on self-managed infrastructure with advanced security compliances.
